webResources.textAttributionSnippet: (en) Portrait of Maria Danielsdotter. Born in May 1790 in Hällestad. Further in life married to the drone Anders Larsson. The couple used to have a long time the ship Linderyd in Vreta Kloster parish. When the husband died in a fever in 1831, he left the husband and four children in poverty. Over the years, however, she gained some prosperity. One of her daughters came to marry the mason Anders Gustaf Ritzman. The couple owned a farm in Lköpping and, according to records, Maria lived periodically with the daughter and the meadow - https://www.europeana.eu/item/73/S_OM_photo_OMEA0001240098. (en) Bergh, Peter Johansson. Östergötlands museum - http://digitaltmuseum.se/021017666521. Public Domain Mark - http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/
